alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 5:05AM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow developing this afternoon will become heavy at times tonight through Saturday. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph, especially to the north of Calumet and along the Lake Superior shore. * WHERE...Keweenaw, Ontonagon, Northern Houghton and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions will be possible at times tonight into Saturday morning across the Keweenaw, especially to the north of Houghton.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
